text: If you are cast in a different mould to the majority, it is no merit of yours: Nature did it.
author: Charlotte Bronte

text: To make a love story, you need a couple of young people, but to reflect on the nature of love, you're better off with old ones. That is a fact of life and literature - and of the novel ever since it fell in love with love in the 18th century.
author: James Buchan

text: It is human nature to instinctively rebel at obscurity or ordinariness.
author: Taylor Caldwell

text: The exposed nature of life in the public square affects leaders' attitudes toward risk - and failure.
author: Dee Dee Myers

text: Nature isn't positive in that way. It doesn't aim itself at you. It's not being unkind to you.
author: David Attenborough
